page.title: 16SWIMMING POOL,Yeoford School
page.content: Yeoford School swimming pool is 2.5 m across and 7.5 m long. It is 230 cm deep and the temperature is quite cold usually! Our Caretaker gets a net every morning to clean out the swimming pool and on very cold nights she puts a cover over the swimming pool. She also makes sure the swimming pool is safe to go in and the chemicals are correct. In the summer term we can swim every school day if it is not too cold and we are allowed to swim 6 days in the summer holiday. The Playgroup are allowed to swim then too. The P.T.A. built the foundations and the sides. The swimming pool cost Â£900 to build and the P.T.A. paid most of that. When we do go swimming we have to wear hats so that we do not block up the filter. There are 46 children in the school and 40 can swim without any swimming aids.
